text: Credit card statement shows $139 charge on November 12 but I cancelled Prime membership on October 10. Need refund for unauthorized billing.
I'll transition your Prime Student membership to regular Prime. Billing cycle adjusts to $14.99 annually. Benefits remain identical.
Subscribed to Prime Student discount $89.99 annually. Graduated last month. Need to switch to regular Prime membership billing.
I can switch your billing from $139 annual to $14.99 monthly. Next charge will be November 28 at monthly rate. Prorated refund processing.
Enrolled in 30-day free trial on November 3. Got charged $29.99 immediately instead of after trial period. Trial supposed to be free.
I see the charge after cancellation date. That's billing error. Processing $89.99 refund to your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Annual Prime membership $29.99 auto-renewed on November 14 without notification. Want to downgrade to monthly $14.99 subscription instead.
